original_title: Mascagni: Cavalleria Rusticana and Leoncavallo: Pagliacci
overview: Streamed live on Sunday, February 9, 2020 at 3.30 PM (CET) from Teatro Municipale Valli di Reggio Emilia (Italy).  CAVALLERIA RUSTICANA // Music by Pietro Mascagni Opera in one act Libretto by Giovanni Targioni-Tozzetti and Guido Menasci adapted from a short story by Giovanni Verga  PAGLIACCI // Music and libretto by Ruggero Leoncavallo Opera in a prologue and two acts
title: Mascagni: Cavalleria Rusticana and Leoncavallo: Pagliacci
